title: Proxmox VE CPU Scaling Governor
textContent:
Proxmox VE CPU Scaling Governor 
                The CPU scaling governor determines how the CPU frequency is adjusted based on the workload, with the
                    goal of either conserving power or improving performance. By scaling the frequency up or down, the
                    operating system can optimize the CPU usage and conserve energy when possible. Generic
                        Scaling Governors
                Run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.
                Copybash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/misc/scaling-governor.sh)"
outerHTML:
Proxmox VE CPU Scaling Governor

The CPU scaling governor determines how the CPU frequency is adjusted based on the workload, with the goal of either conserving power or improving performance. By scaling the frequency up or down, the operating system can optimize the CPU usage and conserve energy when possible. Generic Scaling Governors

Run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/misc/scaling-governor.sh)"
